casebody.data:
Thomas R. Purnell vs. The Pennsylvania Railroad Company. (February 8, 1921.)

Boyce, J., sitting.

Daniel J. Layton for plaintiff. Frank M. Jones for defendant. Superior Court for Sussex County,

February Term, 1921.

Case, No. 18, October Term, 1920. *174Boyce, J.

The name of the county is set forth in the caption attached to the declaration, and thereafter laying the venue in each count, as “in the county aforesaid,” meets any objection *175made against the sufficiency of the declaration. Frick, Adm’r, v. Miller, 7 Boyce, 366,107 Atl. 391; Com. v. Edwards, 4 Gray (Mass.) 1. See also, Wolfe v. B. & P. S. Co., 6 Boyce, 352, 99 Atl. 304.

The demurrer is overruled.
